TopicTitle: [1.3] IR Sequencer v1.0.3 - Add-On to Infernal Robotics (updated 05/06/2017)

Articles.Content: I do, at least if this mod didn't come with an extra one

Action Group Extended is not working properly. I use KSP 1.1.2 and have been testing both the Pre-Release and the Latest 1.0 (Even if it is for 1.1.3) with IR 2.0.1 till the latest version. All it gives out is error when adding in an AGX into the sequence. I even tested on a clean 1.1.3 install with the latest versions and came with the same result; 'Error'. Is this a known error, or should I report with full log?

> 
> 
> Just now, Supergamervictor said:
> 
> 
> Action Group Extended is not working properly. I use KSP 1.1.2 and have been testing both the Pre-Release and the Latest 1.0 (Even if it is for 1.1.3) with IR 2.0.1 till the latest version. All it gives out is error when adding in an AGX into the sequence. I even tested on a clean 1.1.3 install with the latest versions and came with the same result; 'Error'. Is this a known error, or should I report with full log?
> 

That will have to wait until the KSP 1.2 update of Sequencer (due in couple weeks most likely).

Well I hope my mod list updates by then. I'm currently building an STOL system that uses AGX and Sequencer. Thanks for the heads up!

![@ZiwKerman](https://avatars2.githubusercontent.com/u/11242352?v=3&s=40) [ZiwKerman](https://github.com/ZiwKerman) released this 5 minutes ago

Recompile + some bugs fixed.

Download: [https://github.com/MagicSmokeIndustries/IR-Sequencer/releases/tag/1.0.1](https://github.com/MagicSmokeIndustries/IR-Sequencer/releases/tag/1.0.1)

Hi,

IR Sequence does not work for me.

I'm on KSP 1.2, i installed all the latest versions: IR 2.0.6, IR Sequencer 1.0.1, Rework 1.1.2

When clicking on the toolbar to activate the sequencer, i receive the following warning message in the logs: 

"Coroutine couldn't be started because the game object 'SequencerUISettingsWindowPrefab(Clone)' is inactive !"

Does anybody already had this problem?

Thank you for your help

Hi ! I'm a new user of ksp, and I'm having some troubles..Maybe someone could help me here ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)") 

I'm trying to use the Infernal Robotic mod with KSP 1.2

All parts are able to use in the hangar editor, but I can't find the servo controller windows (few days before the 1.2, with my previous version of KSP, it was working perfectly!) and now I can't use this mod.. I downloaded the last version of IR and IR-Sequencer.. Any idea? I send with this message a screen of my game, maybe I just missed something about this mod :

I see you have a bunch of other mods installed, but I don't see IR icon in the toolbar on bottom right, meaning something is wrong with your IR install.

Can you test on a separate install just the stock game + IR?

Make sure you use the latest version of IR (2.0.6) available here:

[https://github.com/MagicSmokeIndustries/InfernalRobotics/releases/tag/2.0.6](https://github.com/MagicSmokeIndustries/InfernalRobotics/releases/tag/2.0.6)

> > > 16 hours ago, Ziw said: > > > Do you by any chance have Contract Configurator installed? Can you post your log file (upload and link your KSP.log)? > Hello, Thank you for your feedback. I only have MechJeb and IR installed. MechJeb has been tested and working, no problem here. I reinstalled IR from scratch (IR + IR Sequencer + Rework), using the latest beta released, flagged as "1.2" compatible. my log file below: [here](http://photos.castaka.com/ksp/KSP.log) I checked and i have an error that should be related to IR [ERR 10:12:47.717] ADDON BINDER: Cannot resolve assembly: KSPUtil, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null [ERR 10:12:47.718] ADDON BINDER: Cannot resolve assembly: KSPUtil, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null [ERR 10:12:47.721] AssemblyLoader: Exception loading 'IRSurfaceSampler': System.Reflection.ReflectionTypeLoadException: The classes in the module cannot be loaded. at (wrapper managed-to-native) System.Reflection.Assembly:GetTypes (bool) at System.Reflection.Assembly.GetTypes () [0x00000] in :0
at AssemblyLoader.LoadAssemblies () [0x00000] in :0 Best

> > > 8 minutes ago, SPD13 said: > > > Hello, > > > > > Thank you for your feedback. I only have MechJeb and IR installed. MechJeb has been tested and working, no problem here. > > > > > I reinstalled IR from scratch (IR + IR Sequencer + Rework), using the latest beta released, flagged as "1.2" compatible. > > > > > my log file below: > > > > > [here](http://photos.castaka.com/ksp/KSP.log) > > > > > I checked and i have an error that should be related to IR > > > > > [ERR 10:12:47.717] ADDON BINDER: Cannot resolve assembly: KSPUtil, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null > > > > > [ERR 10:12:47.718] ADDON BINDER: Cannot resolve assembly: KSPUtil, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null > > > > > [ERR 10:12:47.721] AssemblyLoader: Exception loading 'IRSurfaceSampler': System.Reflection.ReflectionTypeLoadException: The classes in the module cannot be loaded. > > at (wrapper managed-to-native) System.Reflection.Assembly:GetTypes (bool) > > at System.Reflection.Assembly.GetTypes () [0x00000] in :0
> at AssemblyLoader.LoadAssemblies () [0x00000] in :0 > > > > > > > > > > Best > IR Surface Sampler from IR rework is outdated, but should not affect anything except for the corresponding part. If you still wish to use that part you should wait until Zodius releases an update to his pack. Alternatively you may try to get the updated Surface Sampler plugin here: [https://github.com/MagicSmokeIndustries/IR-Surface-Sampler/tree/master/GameData/MagicSmokeIndustries/Parts/Rework_Utility/Plugins](https://github.com/MagicSmokeIndustries/IR-Surface-Sampler/tree/master/GameData/MagicSmokeIndustries/Parts/Rework_Utility/Plugins) Also IR Active Struts is not compatible with KSP 1.2 yet, so I suggest removing it from your install for now. Both can be found in the relevant subfolders in your GameData/MagicSmokeIndustries folder. Apart from the error message in your log about Coroutine (which should not affect anything), I don't see any problems with IR Sequencer. Can you post a screenshot of your craft? Does IR work for you when you move things manually?

IR is working when moving things manually.

Below a screenshot of a simple craft. The error message appears when i click on the sequencer in the toolbar:

Ok, couple more tricks, before I have to get down to code:

Please try deleting GameData/MagicSmokeIndustries/IRSequencer/Plugins/PluginData/IRSequencer/Config.xml

Because the error you are getting should not affect the main Sequencer window, I suspect that window might be drawn outside the screen for some reason.

Also, does Sequencer window work for you in the <abbr title="Vehicle Assembly Building">VAB</abbr>? Can you post a log where you try to open Sequencer from <abbr title="Vehicle Assembly Building">VAB</abbr>, this might give me some more information.
